[i]Bear of Varley[/i] – Whenever an opponent draws a card except their first one they draw in each of their draw steps, create a 2/2 green Bear creature token.
[i]Persecution Complex[/i] – As long as you have 15 or less life, creatures you control with base power and toughness 2/2 get +1/+1 and have haste.
